content.query:
Use [Providers]
GO

create EXTERNAL file format csvFileFormat WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS
    (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = N',',
        USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = TRUE,
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        ENCODING = 'UTF8'
    )
);

create EXTERNAL table [dbo].[providercsv] 
(
    Id	VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8, 
    Provider_Type	VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
    NAME	VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
    GENDER	VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
    SPECIALITY	VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
    ADDRESS	VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
    CITY	VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
    STATE	VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
    ZIP VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8
)
WITH
(
    Location = 'providers/test/',
    DATA_SOURCE = datalake,
    FILE_FORMAT = csvFileFormat
) 

SELECT Top(10) * from providers.dbo.providercsv;
